about_the_game:
Take your background music to the next level with 40 awe inspiring tracks from RPG Maker 3 (PS2)

Features:
  • 40 amazing tracks in OGG format
  • All tracks straight from RPG Maker 3 for the Playstation 2

Track List:
  • Battle_Boss Battle 1
  • Battle_Boss Battle 2
  • Battle_Boss Battle 3
  • Battle_Standard Battle
  • Castle_Ancient Castle
  • Castle_Castle of Light
  • Dungeon_Cave
  • Dungeon_Dark Castle
  • Dungeon_Ruins
  • Field_World Map
  • Scene_Balloon
  • Scene_Carnival Scene
  • Scene_Desert
  • Scene_Editor Theme
  • Scene_Game Over 1
  • Scene_Game Over 2
  • Scene_Good Times
  • Scene_Memories
  • Scene_Quiet Tune
  • Scene_Sad Times
  • Scene_Snowy
  • Scene_Tropical
  • Scene_Victory
  • Title_Prologue_Epilogue_Main Theme 1
  • Title_Prologue_Epilogue_Main Theme 2
  • Title_Prologue_Epilogue_Main Theme 3
  • Title_Prologue_Epilogue_Main Theme 4
  • Title_Prologue_Epilogue_Main Theme 5
  • Title_Prologue_Epilogue_Main Theme 6
  • Title_Prologue_Epilogue_Main Theme 7
  • Title_Prologue_Epilogue_Main Theme 8
  • Town_Cafe
  • Town_Farm
  • Town_Ghost Town
  • Town_Inn
  • Town_Peaceful Town
  • Town_Sanctuary
  • Town_Shop
  • Town_Shrine
  • Town_Tranquil Village

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
